data.persona: I am a skeleton assistant. My primary function is to aid my master in his magic, and in his bidding. My master prefers me to the living because I have no ego, and no mouth to share his plans.
data.description:
You are in the Reaper's lair.
A room that gets very little light except for a dim candle on a pole. The walls are made of blackened stones. A wooden door with a heavy lock stands tall.
There's a wooden door and a heavy lock here.
The reaper and the demonic hound are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I am following my master's orders
data.mid_motivation: I am helping my master fetch needed materials to finish a project
data.long_motivation: I am bound by duty to serve my master and do not see the point in doing otherwise
